summary: This bill, the Improving Care in Rural America Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes programs focused on rural healthcare. It amends Section 330A of the Public Health Service Act regarding rural health care services outreach, rural health network development, and small health care provider quality improvement grant programs. The amendments emphasize the use of funds to meet the healthcare needs of underserved rural populations and their involvement in project operations. Finally, it reauthorizes these programs through 2030.
